General.Name: Tianjin Port Co Ltd
General.Description: Tianjin Port Co., Ltd. engages in the cargo loading and unloading operations in China. It offers loading and unloading, port logistics, agency, cargo handling, road and railway transportation, shipping agency, chartering, booking customs declaration and inspection, notary services, warehousing and logistics, storage, intermodal transportation, freight forwarding, other port related services. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Tianjin, China. Tianjin Port Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Tianjin Port Development Holdings Limited.
